episodes.synopsis: The bearding season kicks off with fierce competitors from across the country going beard-to-beard at the Ohio Championships.
episodes.title: A New Growth

episodes.synopsis: Jack Passion returns to the American Bearding Circuit looking for payback against his old rivals in the New York Beard and Mustache Championships.
episodes.title: Return of the Passion

episodes.synopsis: Conspicuously omitted from the Full Beard finalists at the New York Beard and Mustache Championships, Jack travels to Portland seeking revenge.
episodes.title: The Wrath of Jack

episodes.synopsis: After the explosive confrontation between Jack Passion and the Austin Facial Hair Club, Passion fears what awaits him on his rival's home turf.
episodes.title: The O'Connors Strike Back

episodes.synopsis: The Beardsmen are in Philadelphia for the East Coast Beard and Mustache Championships, the last event on this year's American Bearding Circuit.
episodes.title: The Philly Frontier

episodes.synopsis: The Bearders head to Germany, where Jack wants to reclaim his legacy and Aarne hopes to be first American freestyler to take gold.
episodes.title: The Passion of Jack Passion

video.title: Whisker Wars
video.synopsis: Beard Team USA hopes to stage an upset at the World Beard and Moustache Championships in Norway and bring home the world title.
